languages.text: Техномат позади нас с заметным беспокойством предположил — вероятно, в телах сервиторов проснулись людские души, до того дремавшие глубоко в недрах лоботомированного мозга. Ранее лишенные разума, теперь они осознают, чувствуют и понимают.

traits.locale_text: Техномат позади нас с заметным беспокойством предположил — вероятно, в телах сервиторов проснулись людские души, до того дремавшие глубоко в недрах лоботомированного мозга. Ранее лишенные разума, теперь они осознают, чувствуют и понимают.

languages.text: A visibly shaken technomat behind us proposed that the human souls had awakened within the servitors' bodies after a long slumber deep within their lobotomised brains. Formerly bereft of intelligence, they had attained awareness, feeling, and understanding.
languages.original_text: Техномат позади нас с заметным беспокойством предположил — вероятно, в телах сервиторов проснулись людские души, до того дремавшие глубоко в недрах лоботомированного мозга. Ранее лишенные разума, теперь они осознают, чувствуют и понимают.

A visibly shaken technomat behind us proposed that the human souls had awakened within the servitors' bodies after a long slumber deep within their lobotomised brains. Formerly bereft of intelligence, they had attained awareness, feeling, and understanding.

languages.text: 私たちの後ろにいた明らかに動揺したテクノマットが、人間の魂がサーヴィターの体内で目覚め、意識を取り戻し、感情と理解を持つようになったと提案した。以前は知性を持たず、理解力を持たなかった彼らが、長い間、脳の奥深くで眠り続けた後、意識を獲得したのだった。
languages.original_text: A visibly shaken technomat behind us proposed that the human souls had awakened within the servitors' bodies after a long slumber deep within their lobotomised brains. Formerly bereft of intelligence, they had attained awareness, feeling, and understanding.

traits.locale_text: 私たちの後ろにいた明らかに動揺したテクノマットが、人間の魂がサーヴィターの体内で目覚め、意識を取り戻し、感情と理解を持つようになったと提案した。以前は知性を持たず、理解力を持たなかった彼らが、長い間、脳の奥深くで眠り続けた後、意識を獲得したのだった。

languages.text: Derrière nous, un technomate visiblement choqué émit l'hypothèse que les âmes humaines des servitors avaient pu s'éveiller après avoir longtemps sommeillé dans leurs cerveaux lobotomisés. Auparavant dépourvus d'intelligence, ils avaient accédé à la conscience, aux sensations ainsi qu'à la compréhension.
languages.original_text: A visibly shaken technomat behind us proposed that the human souls had awakened within the servitors' bodies after a long slumber deep within their lobotomised brains. Formerly bereft of intelligence, they had attained awareness, feeling, and understanding.

traits.locale_text: Derrière nous, un technomate visiblement choqué émit l'hypothèse que les âmes humaines des servitors avaient pu s'éveiller après avoir longtemps sommeillé dans leurs cerveaux lobotomisés. Auparavant dépourvus d'intelligence, ils avaient accédé à la conscience, aux sensations ainsi qu'à la compréhension.

languages.text: 我们身后的技工明显地颤抖了一下。他说人类的灵魂在这些机仆的大脑深处沉睡了很久，如今已经再次苏醒。这些机仆先前完全没有智慧可言，可现在却拥有了意识、感知与思考能力。
languages.original_text: A visibly shaken technomat behind us proposed that the human souls had awakened within the servitors' bodies after a long slumber deep within their lobotomised brains. Formerly bereft of intelligence, they had attained awareness, feeling, and understanding.

traits.locale_text: 我们身后的技工明显地颤抖了一下。他说人类的灵魂在这些奴工的大脑深处沉睡了很久，如今已经再次苏醒。这些奴工先前完全没有智慧可言，可现在却拥有了意识、感知与思考能力。

languages.text: A nuestras espaldas, un tecnómata claramente afectado propuso que las almas humanas habían despertado en los cuerpos de los servidores tras un largo sueño en sus cerebros lobotomizados. A pesar de que les habían arrebatado la inteligencia, habían desarrollado consciencia, sensaciones y comprensión.
languages.original_text: A visibly shaken technomat behind us proposed that the human souls had awakened within the servitors' bodies after a long slumber deep within their lobotomised brains. Formerly bereft of intelligence, they had attained awareness, feeling, and understanding.

traits.locale_text: A nuestras espaldas, un tecnómata claramente afectado propuso que las almas humanas habían despertado en los cuerpos de los servidores tras un largo sueño en sus cerebros lobotomizados. A pesar de que les habían arrebatado la inteligencia, habían desarrollado consciencia, sensaciones y comprensión.

languages.text: Ein sichtlich erschütterter Technomat hinter uns mutmaßte, dass die menschlichen Seelen in den Körpern der Servitoren nach einem langen Schlaf tief in ihren lobotomierten Gehirnen erwacht waren. Zuvor hatte ihnen jede Intelligenz gefehlt, doch nun hatten sie ein Bewusstsein entwickelt, Gefühle, Verständnis.
languages.original_text: A visibly shaken technomat behind us proposed that the human souls had awakened within the servitors' bodies after a long slumber deep within their lobotomised brains. Formerly bereft of intelligence, they had attained awareness, feeling, and understanding.

traits.locale_text: Ein sichtlich erschütterter Technomat hinter uns mutmaßte, dass die menschlichen Seelen in den Körpern der Servitoren nach einem langen Schlaf tief in ihren lobotomierten Gehirnen erwacht waren. Zuvor hatte ihnen jede Intelligenz gefehlt, doch nun hatten sie ein Bewusstsein entwickelt, Gefühle, Verständnis.

languages.text: Şaşkınlığı her hâlinden belli olan bir teknomat arkamızdan geldi. Hizmetörlerin bedenlerindeki insan ruhlarının, lobotomi görmüş beyinlerindeki derin uykularından uyanmış olabileceğini söyledi. Daha evvel akıl etmek gibi bir yetileri olmamasına karşın artık farkındalık, hissiyat ve kavrayış sahibi olmuşlardı.
languages.original_text: A visibly shaken technomat behind us proposed that the human souls had awakened within the servitors' bodies after a long slumber deep within their lobotomised brains. Formerly bereft of intelligence, they had attained awareness, feeling, and understanding.

traits.locale_text: Şaşkınlığı her hâlinden belli olan bir teknomat, arkamızdan gelip hizmetörlerin bedenlerindeki insan ruhlarının lobotomi görmüş beyinlerindeki derin uykularından uyanmış olabileceğini söyledi. Daha evvel akletmek gibi bir yetileri olmamasına karşın artık farkındalık, hissiyat ve kavrayış sahibi olmuşlardı.
